snippet.title: Madness Interactive Reloaded - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.studiominus.nl/blog/
https://www.studiominus.nl/madness-interactive-reloaded.html
Recorded in 0.15.4

Music by Lothyde: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yy-3jkeZ4QM

Disclaimer: we know that revolvers do not eject casings. Dikkiedik forgot to check the "no casing" box when making the revolver shown in the video. Dikkiedik will face unmatched punishments.

MADNESS INTERACTIVE RELOADED is a fan reboot of the iconic Madness Interactive flash game. Create your own character and fight your way through enemies who have done you wrong, with animations, graphics, and weapons that make you feel like you're playing in an original Madness Combat episode.

Play through a short but fun and difficult campaign to get revenge on a certain someone, while an original soundtrack by Lothyde plays in the background to feel even more immersed in the Madness universe. You can also play in experiment mode where you create your own scenerios to test and train your skills to become more efficient at killing agents.

And just like the old Madness Interactive, modding is a very big part of the game. Make use of our development tools to easily create new levels, weapons, or apparel.

- How much will it cost?
Nothing. The game is completely free.

- Is this an official Madness game?
No. We are completely unaffiliated with Krinkels.

- Will the game be moddable?
Yes. You can use all the tools we made to develop the game or change it completely. The source code will be open and licensed under GNU General Public License v3.0.

- What can I play it on?
Definitely Windows. Likely Linux. Not MacOS unless you somehow manage to build the project yourself.
